
comment

//source code
contract ExtCodeHashEmpty {

  address public raddr;
  bytes32 public rhash;

  function getHash() public returns (bytes32) {
    bytes32 h;
    //one of the default accounts of regtest
    address addr = 0xCD2a3d9F938E13CD947Ec05AbC7FE734Df8DD826;
    assembly {
      h := extcodehash(addr)
    }
    rhash = h;
    return h;
  }
}
end

account_new acc1 10000000000

# Deploy Contract

transaction_build tx01
    sender acc1
    receiverAddress 00
    value 0
    data 
    gas 2000000
    build

block_build b01
    parent g00
    transactions tx01
    build

block_connect b01
assert_best b01

# invoke getHash method without actually deploying

transaction_build tx02
    sender acc1
    nonce 1
    contract tx01   # created in tx01
    value 0
    data d13319c4
    gas 2000000000
    build

block_build b02
    parent b01
    transactions tx02
    gasLimit 3000000000
    build

block_connect b02
assert_best b02

#repeat until get to activation block


block_build b03
    parent b02
    build

block_connect b03
assert_best b03
block_build b04
    parent b03
    build

block_connect b04
assert_best b04

transaction_build tx03
    sender acc1
    nonce 2
    contract tx01   # created in tx01
    value 0
    data d13319c4
    gas 2000000000
    build

block_build b05
    parent b04
    transactions tx03
    gasLimit 3000000000
    build

block_connect b05
assert_best b05

assert_tx_success tx01
assert_tx_success tx02
assert_tx_success tx03
